entry.title: HTML5 Slides
entry.content:
Few days ago I encountered a problem with making presentation for techtalk. I didn't want to use Microsoft PowerPoint or presentations in Google Docs, because I want to publish slides in my blog. So, it had to be an html5 application and also it had to be ready to be used in browser with projector.

I found some interesting tool to do it. Enjoy it: LandSlide.

The sample presentation with features overview you can find here. Use ← and → to browse slides.
